description: Chewy, crunchy, sweet and chocolatey, you can't go wrong with this dreamy rocky road recipe featuring raisins, glacé cherries and toasted pistachios.
keywords: Rocky road,Cherry,High protein,Slice, brownies & rocky road,Seafood free,Low salt,Christmas,Wheat free,Egg free,Chocolate
name: Raisin & Cherry Rocky Road Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 20cm (6cm deep) square cake pan. Line base and sides with baking paper.
Place raisins, cherries, marshmallows and pistachios in a large bowl and stir to combine. Scatter 1 cup fruit mixture over base of pan.

Place chocolate and butter in a heatproof bowl. Place bowl over a saucepan of simmering water (ensuring base of bowl does not touch water). Stir with a metal spoon until smooth. Remove bowl from heat. Stand for 5 minutes to cool slightly.

Add chocolate mixture to fruit mixture in bowl and stir to coat. Spoon mixture over fruit mixture in pan, pressing gently with back of a spoon to flatten slightly. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until set.
Turn out rocky road onto a chopping board and cut into 4 even rows. Wrap in cellophane to gift.
